GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Fetches all comments for a given article _ID. returns an array of comments, sorted by mot recent first

params.article_id: The ID of the article to fetch comments for
